panels.description: Number of active HTTP and websocket connections to each service instance
panels.title: Service - Active Connections

panels.description: Increase in service API request counts
panels.title: Service - API requests / min
Service - Total time spent on each API call per second

panels.description: Service API latency without Envoy (50th percentile)
panels.title: Service - API Latency 50th Percentile

panels.description: Service API latency without Envoy (99th percentile)
panels.title: Service - API Latency 99th Percentile

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-service(.*)", container!="", image!=""}) by (pod)
avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-service(.*)", container!="", image!=""}) by (pod))
quantile(.90 ,sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-service(.*)", container!="", image!=""}) by (pod))

panels.description: Number of active HTTP and websocket connections to each instance of the logger
panels.title: Logger - Active Connections

targets.expr: avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-logger(.*)", container="osmo-logger", image!=""}) by (pod))
quantile(0.90, sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-logger(.*)", container="osmo-logger", image!=""}) by (pod))
avg(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-router(.*)", container="osmo-router", image!=""}) by (pod))
quantile(0.90, sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-router(.*)", container="osmo-router", image!=""}) by (pod))

panels.description: That total number of ongoing port-forward/exec connections
panels.title: Router - Active Connections

targets.expr: quantile(0.90, sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="default", pod=~"osmo-agent(.*)", container="osmo-agent"}) by (pod))

panels.description: Processing duration of Jobs by status

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, job_type, job_status) (rate(osmo_worker_job_processing_time_bucket{job_type!="CheckQueueTimeout", job_type!="CheckRunTimeout"}[5m:])))
avg(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, job_type, job_status) (rate(osmo_worker_job_processing_time_bucket{job_type!="CheckQueueTimeout", job_type!="CheckRunTimeout"}[5m:]))))

panels.title: Worker - Job Latency
